Strings.Text: {scroll 0}Okay, Jill and I will stay\nin the hall in case of{scroll 1}{clear 95}{scroll 0}\nan emergency.{scroll 1}{timed 35}
{scroll 0}\nNow Jill, can you go?{scroll 1}{clear 65}{scroll 0}I'm going with you, Chris is\nour old partner you know.{scroll 1}{timed 120}
{scroll 0}\nHelp me look for him Jill, {scroll 1}{clear 37}{scroll 0}and don't leave this hall\nfor the time being.{scroll 1}{timed 74}
{scroll 0}What is this all about?\nI can't figure it out at all.{scroll 1}{timed 111}
{scroll 0}Okay, I'll try the door\non the opposite side.{scroll 1}{timed 109}
{scroll 0}No, I'll take care of\nthat direction.{scroll 1}{clear 75}{scroll 0}I told you to start \nfrom the other side Jill.{scroll 1}{timed 73}
{scroll 0}Listen, if something happens,\nlet's meet up in this hall.{scroll 1}{timed 135}
{scroll 0}Jill! What's going on?\nAny clues?{scroll 1}{clear 116}{scroll 0}No, but something's\nwrong with this house.{scroll 1}{timed 123}
{scroll 0}Woah!\nThis hall is dangerous.{scroll 1}{clear 115}{scroll 0}Maybe it's better to secure\nour escape route first. {scroll 1}{timed 109}
{scroll 0}There must be\na backdoor somewhere.{scroll 1}{clear 100}{scroll 0}Let's try to find it\nfirst, shall we?{scroll 1}{timed 85}
{scroll 0}\nOkay, let's separate again.{scroll 1}{clear 80}{scroll 0}Just a moment!\nI found something.{scroll 1}{timed 85}
{scroll 2}The stairs look unsafe.\nBetter not chance it.
{scroll 2}I cannot leave until\nI kill the Tyrant.
